body: You are honest and responsible, something you look for in other people you want to make close relationships with.
You often face adversity with an open mind, and approach situations with an adaptable mindset.
Persistence is key and you've been aware of it your whole life, constantly striving to complete tasks.
Others often look to you as a beacon of empathy, someone who is understanding and relates well to others.
You are couragous in when faced with a challenge, and won't give up when your back is against the wall.
Dogs should look to you as an example of how to be loyal, others can rely on you without question.
Creativity flows from your mind, and others often come to you for ideas or motivation to start a new project.
You are often optimistic in your outlook on life. The little things don't bother you and you prefer to look at the big picture.
Your thoughts are your own - you are independent and don't let others influence your beliefs.
You are humble when faced with praise, and often understate your accomplishments.
